Package server.model

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
server.model.GameManager
public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
The game manager class which supervises all the game
Version:
1.0
Author:
axel gauthier

    • isAGoodMove

      public boolean isAGoodMove​(int srcX, int srcY, int destX, int destY, ClientWrapper player)
      Verify if the move made by the player is valid or not
      Parameters:
      srcX - X-coordinate of the character to be moved
      srcY - Y-coordinate of the character to be moved
      destX - X-coordinate of the landing place
      destY - Y-coordinate of the landing place
      player - The player
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid, false otherwise

    • playMove

      public int isGameOver()
      Indicates if the game is won or not
      Returns:
